title: Hollywoodland: An American Fairy Tale
description: Fiction. The novel HOLLYWOODLAND: AN AMERICAN FAIRY TALE tells the story of small town girl Sharlene Miller gone to Hollywood in search of fame and fortune. In pursuit of her dreams she becomes a groupie, porn star, television celebrity, and finally, the cultural icon Sierra. Struggling with demons real and imagined, addicted to drugs and abandoned by her fans, Sierra moves on through coma-induced hallucinations and ever more fantastically pornographic films, ultimately exposing Hollywood itself. Modeled on Alice in Wonderland, The E! True Hollywood Story, and the lives of real starlets Marilyn Monroe, Jane Mansfield, Kristi Lynn and Savannah, HOLLYWOODLAND: AN AMERICAN FAIRY TALE is the progression of a definitive Hollywood dream.
author: Jennifer Banash
